# context_response

Interfaces for LLM responses with context.

This module defines interfaces for the responses returned by language models that have
contextual information or data, such as the history of messages used to generate the
response.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/context_response/index" symbolName="ContextTool" /> ContextTool

Tool instance with arguments provided by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/context_response/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/context_response/index" symbolName="BaseResponse" /> BaseResponse

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="responses/context_response/index" symbolName="ContextResponse" /> ContextResponse

The response generated by an LLM.
